mutants.code:
def sum_even_fibonacci(limit):
    sum = 1
    current_fib = 2
    previous_fib = 1
    while current_fib < limit:
        if current_fib % 2 == 0:
            sum += current_fib
        next_fib = current_fib + previous_fib
        previous_fib = current_fib
        current_fib = next_fib
    return sum
